q: "I am convinced he is now going to run for governor," said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. The 51-year-old Mr. Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order. He had made multiple trips to states that host early presidential primary contests. Mr. Mike McDaniel said the decision not to run must have been difficult. "He had a lot of people around the

After his stirring performance listing the conclusive proof of Saddam Hussein 's weapons of mass destruction, and his unquestionable ties to al-Qaeda, Colin Powell completed the slam dunk by moving towards the conclusion of his speech with this, My friends, this has been a long and a detailed presentation, and I thank you for your patience. But there is one more subject that I would like to touch on briefly, and it should be a subject of deep and continuing concern to this council: Saddam Hussein 's violations of human rights. "We have a very long relationship with Tunisia," Rumsfeld remarked after the meetings.
